page.title: 11HEALTHY MILTON CHILDREN.
page.content: In Milton School,health is carefully watched.When the{audiometrician}comes to test ears,she puts earphones on us and turns knobs on a machine behind us.If we hear a certain sound,we tell her.The{nurse}tests our eyes by standing in front of us,holding a card and we say the letter or copy the direction of the hand on the card.Each spring the{dentist's}van comes for two weeks .It is fitted like the surgery in Markinch.We wash out our mouths with pink liquid after he examines our teeth.A cable from the van gets electricity from the school.The{school {doctor}thoroughly checks us in our first and last years,but the{nurse } comes often to check hair and skin.I like the{chiropodist}best,for he is funny when he examines your feet.All schools in Fife have the same care as Milton of Balgonie.
